name: Ten-Second Murder
description:
A killer’s on the loose, and victims are piling up! With ten seconds to investigate each murder, can you solve the case?

Tested with Chrome and Firefox. Please report bugs to https://twitter.com/lectvs, thanks :) 

Controls:

  • Mouse - Everything
  • ESC - Pause
  • F - Fullscreen

Tools Used:

  • pixi.js 
  • WebAudio API
  • Paint.NET 
  • sfxia
  • SFXR
  • FLStudio
